"exports.run={usage:["schat","pchat"],use:"id or number",category:"owner",async:async(t,{func:a,anya:n,setting:s,froms:e})=>{switch(t.command){case"schat":if(!t.isOwner)return t.reply(global.mess.owner);if(!t.text)return t.reply("Input nomor target!");if(t.text.endsWith("@g.us")){if(s.chat.to===t.args[0])return t.reply("Sudah tersambung ke grup itu sebelumnya.");s.chat={from:t.sender,to:t.args[0]};let e=await n.groupMetadata(t.args[0]).catch(e=>{});n.reply(s.chat.to,`@${t.sender.split("@")[0]} telah menyambungkan ke chat ini

- _sekarang chat ini telah terhubung dengan owner_.`,a.fstatus("System Notification"),{mentions:[t.sender]}).then(()=>t.reply("Berhasil menyambungkan ke chat "+e.subject))}else{if(s.chat.to===e)return t.reply("Sudah tersambung ke nomor itu sebelumnya.");s.chat={from:t.sender,to:e},n.reply(s.chat.to,`@${t.sender.split("@")[0]} telah menyambungkan ke chat ini

- _sekarang chat ini telah terhubung dengan owner_.`,a.fstatus("System Notification"),{mentions:[t.sender]}).then(()=>t.reply("Berhasil menyambungkan ke @"+e.split("@")[0]))}break;case"pchat":if(!t.isOwner)return t.reply(global.mess.owner);if(!s.chat.to)return t.reply("Tidak ada sambungan chat yang sedang berlangsung.");if(s.chat.to.endsWith("@g.us")){let e=await n.groupMetadata(s.chat.to).catch(e=>{});n.reply(s.chat.to,`@${t.sender.split("@")[0]} telah memutuskan chat ini

- _sekarang chat ini telah terputus dengan owner_.`,a.fstatus("System Notification"),{mentions:[t.sender]}).then(()=>t.reply("Berhasil memutuskan ke @"+e.split("@")[0]));s.chat={from:"",to:""}}},main:async(e,{func:t,anya:a,setting:n})=>{var s;n.hasOwnProperty("chat")||(n.chat={from:"",to:""}),e.isPc&&n.chat&&n.chat.from.includes(e.chat)&&!e.isPrefix&&!e.fromMe&&(await a.copyNForward(n.chat.to,e,!1),a.sendReact(e.chat,"ðŸ“¬",e.key)),n.chat&&n.chat.to.includes(e.chat)&&!e.isPrefix&&!e.fromMe&&(s=e.chat.endsWith("@g.us")?"\nIn grup "+global.db.metadata[e.chat].subject:e.sender!==e.chat?"\nIn chat @"+e.chat.split("@")[0]:"","protocolMessage"===e.mtype?await a.reply(n.chat.from,`@${e.sender.split("@")[0]} deleted this message`+s,t.fverified,{mentions:[e.sender,e.chat],expiration:0}):"editedMessage"===e.mtype?await a.reply(n.chat.from,`@${e.sender.split("@")[0]} edited this message`+s,t.fverified,{mentions:[e.sender,e.chat],expiration:0}):"reactionMessage"===e.mtype?await a.reply(n.chat.from,`@${e.sender.split("@")[0]} `+(""!==e.message.reactionMessage.text?"reaction this message: "+e.message.reactionMessage.text:"delete reaction message")+s,t.fverified,{mentions:[e.sender,e.chat],expiration:0}):(a.sendReact(e.chat,"ðŸ“¬",e.key),t=await a.copyNForward(n.chat.from,e,!0),await a.reply(n.chat.from,"Chat from @"+e.sender.split("@")[0]+s,t,{mentions:[e.sender,e.chat],expiration:0})))},location:"plugins/owner/autochat.js"};"

"exports.run={usage:[\"brat\"],hidden:[\"brt\"],use:\"text\",category:\"tools\",async:async(e,{func:t,anya:a,packname:r,author:n})=>{let o;if(1<=e.args.length)o=e.args.slice(0).join(\" \");else{if(!e.quoted||!e.quoted.text)return e.reply(\"Input atau reply text!\");o=e.quoted.text}if(!o)return e.reply(t.example(e.cmd,\"I love you\"));if(150<o.length)return e.reply(\"Max 150 character!\");a.sendReact(e.chat,\"ðŸ•’\",e.key);t=\"https://ochinpo-helper.hf.space/brat?text=\"+encodeURIComponent(o);await a.sendStickerFromUrl(e.chat,t,e,{packname:r,author:n,expiration:e.expiration})},limit:10};"

"let fs=require("fs"),path=require("path"),axios=require("axios"),execSync=require("child_process").execSync;exports.run={usage:["bratvideo"],hidden:["bratgif"],use:"text",category:"example",async:async(r,{func:e,anya:a,packname:i,author:n})=>{let t;if(1<=r.args.length)t=r.args.slice(0).join(" ");else{if(!r.quoted||!r.quoted.text)return r.reply("Input atau reply text!");t=r.quoted.text}if(!t)return r.reply(e.example(r.cmd,"hello world"));if(250<t.length)return r.reply("Max 250 character!");a.sendReact(r.chat,"ðŸ•’",r.key);var s=t.split(" "),c=path.resolve("media"),l=(fs.existsSync(c)||fs.mkdirSync(c),[]);try{for(let e=0;e<s.length;e++){var o=s.slice(0,e+1).join(" "),p=await axios.get("https://brat.caliphdev.com/api/brat?text="+encodeURIComponent(o),{responseType:"arraybuffer"}).catch(e=>e.response),f=path.join(c,`frame${e}.mp4`);fs.writeFileSync(f,p.data),l.push(f)}let e=path.join(c,"filelist.txt"),t="";for(let e=0;e<l.length;e++)t=`${t}file '${l[e]}'
duration 0.7
`;t+=`file '${l[l.length-1]}'
duration 2
`,fs.writeFileSync(e,t);var u=path.join(c,"output.mp4");execSync(`ffmpeg -y -f concat -safe 0 -i ${e} -vf "fps=30" -c:v libx264 -preset ultrafast -pix_fmt yuv420p `+u),await a.sendStickerFromUrl(r.chat,u,r,{packname:i,author:n,expiration:r.expiration}),l.forEach(e=>{fs.existsSync(e)&&fs.unlinkSync(e)}),fs.existsSync(e)&&fs.unlinkSync(e),fs.existsSync(u)&&fs.unlinkSync(u)}catch(e){a.reply(r.chat,`An error occurred while creating the sticker.
- `+e.message,r,{expiration:r.expiration})}},location:"plugins/convert/bratgif.js",limit:5};"
